mapper.select: select POST_ID, POST_SUBJECT, POST_CONTENT, POST_IMAGES, POST_FILES, POST_VIEWCNT, POST_CMTCNT, POST_LIKECNT, POST_CREATED_AT, POST_UPDATED_AT, USER_ID, USER_NICKNAME, USER_IMG from (select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by a.POST_ID desc) as ROWNUM, a.POST_ID, a.POST_SUBJECT, a.POST_CONTENT, a.POST_IMAGES, a.POST_FILES, a.POST_VIEWCNT, a.POST_CMTCNT, a.POST_LIKECNT, a.POST_CREATED_AT, a.POST_UPDATED_AT, b.USER_ID, b.USER_NICKNAME, b.USER_IMG from CUNSULT_POST as a join USER_INFO as b on a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID where post_subject like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or post_content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) as c where ROWNUM >= 1 + #{limit} * (#{page} - 1) and ROWNUM < 1 + #{limit} * #{page} ) as d
